pull.title: doc: fix command typo in guix README

events.message: Updated Readme, Corrected the codesign typo

events.body: Feel free to pull in any of these fixups as well: https://github.com/jonatack/bitcoin/commit/e279f6a09a38dabc6b80d537d3212abddba5ed8b

rename.from: Updated guix Readme, Corrected the codesign command typo
rename.to: doc: fix command typo in guix README

events.body: In future, please remove the default comment from the PR template, even if you're not writing a PR description. Also, you can use a prefix in your commit message. See how I've edited the title.
@hg333 Your git name is "h". You might want to change this so that it's easier to credit you in the release notes next time. For 23.0 I'm going to use "hg333".
